extensionDescription_mask.message: Firefox Relay rende facile crear mascas de e-mail que reexpedi le messages recipite a tu real cassa de entrata.
extensionDescription_mask.description: Shortened description of the extension. Must remain under 132 characters. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

extensionDescriptionStore_mask.message: Firefox Relay te adjuta a proteger tu ver adresse de e-mail – le adresse que es le plus intimemente ligate a tu identitate in linea. Illo te permitte de generar mascas unic e aleatori que tu pote usar pro inscriber te a contos, applicationes, o bulletines de novas, e reexpedi le messages a tu ver adresse. Si tu trova que un conto invia e-mail indesirate o spam, tu pote blocar le masca e illo stoppara le invio de e-mail a tu cassa de entrata. Un vice que tu non vole plus un conto, tu pote deler le masca.
extensionDescriptionStore_mask.description: Shortened description of the extension. Must remain under 132 characters. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

labelRelayPremium.description: Alt text for the premium Relay logo. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay Premium".

firstRunP.message: Tu ha installate con successo le additivo Firefox Relay. Pro comenciar, accede a Relay con tu Firefox Account.
firstRunP.description: First sentence on the first run page after installing the add-on. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay", "Relay", or "Firefox".

firstRunP2.message: Tu ha installate con successo le additivo Firefox Relay. Pro comenciar, accede a Firefox Relay con tu conto.
firstRunP2.description: First sentence on the first run page after installing the add-on. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay", "Relay", or "Firefox".

firstRunCollectDataLabel.message: Permitter a Mozilla de colliger informationes re como tu usa iste extension.
firstRunCollectDataLabel.description: On the first run page after installing the add-on, we show a toggle and ask the user if the add-on can send interaction data to Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla".

allowDataCollection.description: The label on the toggle that ALLOWS sending interaction data to Mozilla.

disableDataCollection.description: The label on the toggle that DISABLES sending interaction data to Mozilla.

firstRunPrefP_mask.message: Colliger datos de interaction quando tu face cosas como cliccar le icone de Relay in tu barra del instrumentos o crear un nove masca adjuta nos a apprender lo que functiona ben e ubi nos pote meliorar. Tu pote sempre disactivar isto in le quadro del parametros.
firstRunPrefP_mask.description: On the first run page after installing the add-on, we tell the user how interaction data helps Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay".

popupStatsTitle.description: A shortened version of the word Statistics.  This panel displays the users total number of blocked and forwarded emails and other Relay usage numbers

popupNewsLink.description: The title of the navigation link for the News panel

popupNewsTitle.message: Qual es le novas in Relay

popupSettingsShowIcon.message: Monstrar icone de Relay in campos de e-mail sur sitos web
popupSettingsShowIcon.description: In the settings panel, we display a toggle so the user can enable or disable the Relay icon in websites. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay".

popupSettingsCollectData.message: Permitter a Mozilla de colliger datos de interaction
popupSettingsCollectData.description: The label on the toggle that ENABLES sending interaction data to Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla".

popupReportIssueSiteLabelHeadline.message: Io ha problemas con iste sito web

popupReportIssueCaseOne.message: Le masca email non era acceptate per le sito web

popupReportIssueCaseTwo.message: Le additivo Relay causava un problema de visualisation de sito web

popupReportIssueCaseThree.message: Io non ha recipite un email attendite ab iste sito web

popupReportIssueSuccessBody.message: Gratias pro adjutar nos a meliorar Firefox Relay!

popupSignUpPanelIntro.message: Comencia per acceder a Relay con tu Firefox Account.
popupSignUpPanelIntro.description: In the pop-up panel, before the user has signed in, we invite to them sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay", OR "Firefox".

popupSignUpPanelIntro2.message: Comencia per acceder a Relay con tu conto.
popupSignUpPanelIntro2.description: In the pop-up panel, before the user has signed in, we invite to them sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay"sssss.

popupRemainingAliases_2_mask.description: Tells the user how many more masks they can make.

popupRemainingFreeMasks.description: Tells the user how many more free masks they can make.

popupRecentlyUsedMasks.description: Label for list of most recently used masks.

labelMaskCreated.description: In the pop-up panel, a text bubble will appear next to a new mask when it is created.

labelFromThisWebsite.description: In the pop-up panel, the use can view masks only created or used on a certain website.

labelAllEmailMasks.description: In the pop-up panel, the use can view all masks they've created.

popupOnboardingMaxAliasesPanelBody.message: Tu es un usator de potentia de Firefox Relay!
popupOnboardingMaxAliasesPanelBody.description: In the pop-up panel, when a free user has hit their mask limit, we tell them they're a power-user. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

popupGetDomainButton.message: Recipe un dominio email Relay unic

popupMasksUsedInThisWebsite.message: Mascas usate in iste sito web

popupUpgradeToPremiumBanner.message: Promove a Relay Premium pro major protection!

popupEducationalComponent1Body.message: Relay pote adjutar a proteger tu e-mail non importa ubi tu es.

popupAttachmentSizeIncreaseBody.message: Firefox Relay pote ora reexpedir messages de e-mail usque a 25MB, includite annexos.

popupEndOfIntroPricingHeadline.message: Nostre offerta de compra introductive finira tosto!

popupEndOfIntroPricingBody.message: Obtene Relay Premium ante le 27 de septembre e frue del uso illimitate de mascas per nostre precio mensual promotional.

popupEndOfIntroPricingCountdownDays.description: This label displayed on top of a large number representing the number of DAYS of the remaining time that the introductory pricing offer is still valid. Please abbreviate if the word exceeds 5 characters.

popupEndOfIntroPricingCountdownHours.description: This label displayed on top of a large number representing the number of HOURS of the remaining time that the introductory pricing offer is still valid. Please abbreviate if the word exceeds 5 characters.

popupEndOfIntroPricingCountdownMinutes.description: This label displayed on top of a large number representing the number of MINUTES of the remaining time that the introductory pricing offer is still valid. There's not much room for this, hence the abbreviation.

popupEndOfIntroPricingCountdownSeconds.description: This label displayed on top of a large number representing the number of SECONDS of the remaining time that the introductory pricing offer is still valid. There's not much room for this, hence the abbreviation.

popupPromoBlockingButtonCopy.message: Activa le blocage de e-mail promotional sur un masca pro impedir que le messages de campanias publicitari attinge tu cassa de entrata.

popupBlockPromotionalEmailsBodyNonPremiu.message: Con Relay Premium, tu pote impedir que le e-mail promotional attinge tu cassa de entrata durante que tu continua a reciper messages como quitantias o informationes de expedition.

popupBundlePromoHeadline_2.message: Adde Mozilla VPN con un reduction de $SAVINGS$.
popupBundlePromoHeadline_2.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a savings variable, e.g. 50%

popupBundlePromoHeadline_3.message: Adde Mozilla VPN con un reduction del $SAVINGS$.
popupBundlePromoHeadline_3.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a savings variable, e.g. 50%

popupBundlePromoBody_2.message: Plano de un anno includite Relay Premium + Mozilla VPN pro $MONTHLY_PRICE$/month.
popupBundlePromoBody_2.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay Premium" and "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a monthly price variable, e.g. $4.99

popupBundlePromoBody_3.message: Obtene un anno de Relay Premium Phone Masking plus Mozilla VPN pro $MONTHLY_PRICE$/mense.
popupBundlePromoBody_3.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay Premium" and "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a monthly price variable, e.g. $4.99

popupPasswordManagerRelayHeadline.message: Gestor de contrasignos de Firefox + Relay

popupPasswordManagerRelayBody.message: Ora tu pote usar Relay directemente in le gestor de contrasignos de Firefox.

popupBundlePromoHeadlineFreePlan.message: Introducente: plano de abonamento Relay + VPN

popupBundlePromoBodyFreePlan.message: Promove tu abonamento pro haber ambe Relay Premium + Mozilla VPN pro $MONTHLY_PRICE$/mense. Sparnia $SAVINGS$!
popupBundlePromoBodyFreePlan.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay Premium" and "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a monthly price variable, e.g. $4.99. It also includes a savings variable, e.g. 50%

popupPhoneMaskingPromoHeadline.message: Introduction al mascas del numero telephonic

popupPhoneMaskingPromoBody.message: Disguisante le numero de telephono, ora tu pote crea un masca del numero de telephono que te adjuta a reciper textos e appellos sin revelar tu ver numero.

popupPhoneMaskingPromoBodyPremium.message: Obtene textos e appellos sin revelar tu ver numero.

popupCreateCustomMaskBody.message: Toto lo que tu debe facer es crear e compartir un unic masca que usa tu subdominio personal, le masca sera generate automaticamente. Per exemplo proba “shop@customsubdomain.mozmail.com” le proxime vice que tu compra online.

popupCreateCustomFormMaskInputLabel.message: Insere un prefixo de masca email

pageInputIconSignUpText.message: Visita le sito web de Firefox Relay pro acceder o crear un conto.
pageInputIconSignUpText.description: In the website content icon pop-up, before a user has signed in, we tell them to sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

pageInputIconSignUpButton.description: In the website content icon pop-up, before a user has signed in, we tell them to sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

pageInputIconSelectFromYourCurrentEmailM.message: Elige ab tu actual mascas email
pageInputIconSelectFromYourCurrentEmailM.description: In the website content icon pop-up, users can re-use masks they've already created. This label is displayed when this is the only list visible.

pageInputIconAdditionalEmailMasks.description: In the website content icon pop-up, users can re-use masks they've already created.

pageInputIconPreviouslyUsedMask.message: Previemente usate sur iste sito web
pageInputIconPreviouslyUsedMask.description: In the website content icon pop-up, users can select specific masks they've created on the current website.

pageInputIconJoinPremiumWaitlist.message: Junge te al lista de attendentia premio
pageInputIconJoinPremiumWaitlist.description: For some free users (based on geographic region), Firefox Relay premium is not avialable yet. We instead prompt users to join our waitlist to be notified when it is available.

pageInputIconUseExistingAliasFromTheSite.message: Usar un masca existente ab iste sito…

pageInputIconInsertPhoneMask.message: Usa le masca de numero de telephono

pageInputIconMaxAliasesError_mask.message: Tu ha jam create le maxime numero de mascas
pageInputIconMaxAliasesError_mask.description: Tells the user they have already created the max number of masks.

pageNoMasksRemaining.message: Tu non ha altere mascas gratuite.
pageNoMasksRemaining.description: Error message that appears when a free tier user uses all of their masks.

profilePageInvalidAliasCharactersError.description: Error message that appears when the user tries to use special characters when labelling an mask.

profilePageDefaulAliasLabelText.description: On the user's profile page, this text appears for a mask when it doesn't have a label.

popupDataCollectionBody_mask.message: Tu pote permitter a Relay de colliger datos optional pro nos consentir de synchronisar tu etiquettas de masca inter apparatos con le sitos web ubi illos ha essite create e es usate.

popupPrivacyNoticeUpdateBody.message: Pro meliorar le soliditate de Firefox Relay in caso que un e-mail non pote esser livrate, nos temporarimente mantenera le message de e-mail sur nostre servitores usque illo ha essite livrate. Nos non lo retenera jammais plus de tres dies.

popupFreeMasksAvailable.description: Tells the user how many more masks they can make.

popupFreeMasksLimitReached.message: Tu ha usate tote tu $MAXIMUM$ mascas gratuite.
popupFreeMasksLimitReached.description: Tells the user they've created the maxmimum free masks

popupNoMasksCreatedBody.message: Usa le mascas de Relay pro mantener tu identitate private e reciper solmente le emails que tu vole in tu cassa de entrata.

popupCsatSurveyText.message: Quanto es vos satisfacite de vostre experientia con Firefox Relay?

popupCsatSurveyChoiceMadeBody.message: Nos amarea saper plus re como nos pote facer melio. Vole tu responder a un questionario de duo minutas?

popupEuCountryExpansionBody.message: Firefox Relay Premium es ora disponibile in tu pais. Protege tu cassa de entrata con un numero illimitate de mascas de e-mail, e obtene un dominio Relay unic pro render le creation immediate de mascas facile e secur.

popupHolidayPromo2023Headline.description: Do not modify 20%. This is a holiday discount rate. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay Premium".

popupHolidayPromo2023Body.message: Iste saison de vacantia, sparnia le 20% sur le precio de 1 anno de Relay Premium. Justo insere le codice de promotion “HOLIDAY20” al momento del pagamento. Le offerta expira le 31 decembre 2023.
popupHolidayPromo2023Body.description: Do not modify 20%. This is a holiday discount rate. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay Premium".
